items.description:
G'day everyone, welcome to issue #352 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrap-up of the community articles around Xamarin and MAUI communities this week.

It's finally happened - .NET Maui has finally gone General Availability (GA). That's a massive achievement! A big congratulations to the MAUI team for all their hard work. If you are getting started there are some great resources linked out in this weeks edition.

Now go have fun with MAUI, and have a fantastic week.

Kym
items.description_markdown:
G'day everyone, welcome to issue #352 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrap-up of the community articles around Xamarin and MAUI communities this week.

It's finally happened - .NET Maui has finally gone General Availability (GA). That's a massive achievement! A big congratulations to the MAUI team for all their hard work. If you are getting started there are some great resources linked out in this weeks edition.

Now go have fun with MAUI, and have a fantastic week.

Kym

items.title: Introducing .NET MAUI - One Codebase, Many Platforms
items.description:
MAUI is GA! - Welcome to .NET Multi-platform App UI. This release marks a new milestone in the multi-year journey to unify the .NET platform.

Introducing .NET MAUI - One Codebase, Many Platforms by David Ortinau
items.description_markdown:
MAUI is GA! - Welcome to .NET Multi-platform App UI. This release marks a new milestone in the multi-year journey to unify the .NET platform.

This is the Microsoft self-paced training on .NET MAUI. In this learning path, use C# and Visual Studio with .NET MAUI to create an app that runs across iOS, Android, and Windows.

items.title: macOS Environment Setup For MAUI Development
items.description:
This post will walk you through all the steps you need to take to prepare your environment for MAUI development on macOS. If you follow the steps, you’ll have a development environment ready to write MAUI apps targeting macOS, iOS, and Android.

items.description_markdown:
This post will walk you through all the steps you need to take to prepare your environment for MAUI development on macOS. If you follow the steps, you’ll have a development environment ready to write MAUI apps targeting macOS, iOS, and Android.

items.title: Why so serious? Smile analysis with Azure and .NET MAUI - Andreas Nesheim
items.description:
This post shows you how you can use Face API in Azure and .NET MAUI to create an app where you can take a picture of yourself and get an objective result of how much you’re smiling!

items.description_markdown:
This post shows you how you can use Face API in Azure and .NET MAUI to create an app where you can take a picture of yourself and get an objective result of how much you’re smiling!

items.title: Visual Studio 2022 for Mac is now available
items.description:
Now available: the general availability (GA) release of Visual Studio 2022 for Mac v17.0 . This is the fastest Visual Studio for Mac version yet with an all new native macOS UI, fully running on .NET 6, and optimized for Apple Silicon (ARM64) processors.

Visual Studio 2022 for Mac is now available by Jordan Matthiesen
items.description_markdown:
Now available: the general availability (GA) release of Visual Studio 2022 for Mac v17.0 . This is the fastest Visual Studio for Mac version yet with an all new native macOS UI, fully running on .NET 6, and optimized for Apple Silicon (ARM64) processors.

[**Visual Studio 2022 for Mac is now available**](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/visual-studio-2022-for-mac-is-now-available) by [Jordan Matthiesen](https://twitter.com/jmatthiesen)

embedded_links.title: **Visual Studio 2022 for Mac is now available**
